Package agh.alleviation.service

Class SeanceService

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.service.EntityObjectService<Seance,​SeanceRepository>
agh.alleviation.service.SeanceService
@Service
public class SeanceService
extends EntityObjectService<Seance,​SeanceRepository>
Service responsible for manipulating the seance repository.
Author:
Ksenia Fiodarava
See Also:
SeanceRepository, Seance
